DOC.detailed_description: Success pelvic floor muscle training ( PFMT ) hamper non-adherence , related factor inability contract pelvic floor muscle lack motivation . Thus supervision physiotherapist ( outpatient training ) , PFMT potential improve adherence training demonstrate effective compare unsupervised PFMT ( home training ) . The objective study compare effect outpatient pelvic floor muscle train versus home pelvic floor muscle training treatment stress urinary incontinence . This randomize controlled trial conduct Division Urogynecology Reconstructive Pelvic Surgery Federal University Sao Paulo , Brazil . As primary endpoint , standardized volume test pad ( 250 mL ) use . To assert one group ( home PFMT outpatient PFMT ) superior , necessary find 38.5 % patient cure group compare . Secondary outcome measure use , assessment pelvic floor muscle function , urinary symptom , quality life subjective cure .
